attributes.description:
From the interior finish and layout to the exterior, the new i20 is a display of daring style and unforgettable memories waiting to happen. It comes complete with comprehensive safety features for the road ahead, and a host of premium features to be enjoyed by you and your crew. Convenience goes hand in hand with the new i20, as showcased by the thoughtful design of the electric fold-away side mirrors*. You can listen to all your favorite tunes with Apple CarPlay or Android Auto, while the multifunction steering wheel puts you in control with both audio, and cruise control.

Please give us a call to arrange a test drive at Hyundai George
